hero_subtitle: Tell us about your land, income, and family in seconds — by typing or speaking. Niti-Setu reads the actual scheme documents and tells you exactly which benefits you qualify for, and why.
lp_feat_title: A Complete Picture, Not Just a Yes or No
lp_feat_desc: Built on real government documents — not guesswork. Every eligibility answer comes with the clause it was drawn from.
lp_feat1_desc: Speak in your language — Whisper AI transcribes and processes your details instantly.
lp_feat2_desc: LLaMA 3.3 reads scheme PDFs and matches your profile against real eligibility clauses.
lp_feat3_desc: Every answer cites the exact scheme section so you know the reasoning — not just the result.
lp_feat4_desc: District-level analytics: scheme adoption trends, demographic breakdowns, history logs.
lp_feat5_desc: JWT auth with strict RBAC. Farmer data stays private — admins see only aggregated insights.
lp_feat6_desc: One-tap Google login — no password set-up needed for farmers accessing for the first time.
lp_aud_title: From the Field to the District Office
lp_aud_desc: Niti-Setu is built for everyone across the agricultural support chain — not just administrators.
lp_aud1_desc: Type or speak your farm details and get a clear list of eligible schemes with exact benefit amounts — in seconds.
lp_aud2_desc: Monitor which schemes are gaining traction, identify underserved populations, and track historical checks.
lp_aud3_desc: Upload new scheme PDFs to instantly expand the knowledge base and stress-test eligibility logic.
lp_aud4_desc: Run bulk eligibility checks on behalf of rural communities to identify overlooked benefit gaps.
lp_tech1_desc: Sub-second LLM inference for reliable eligibility judgment on any farm profile.
lp_tech2_desc: All passwords bcrypt-hashed. Role-based access splits farmer and admin views completely.
lp_tech3_desc: Multilingual speech recognition — farmers can dictate in their regional language.
lp_tech4_desc: No LangChain. Built from scratch: PDF → chunks → embeddings → Atlas vector search.
lp_cta_desc: Register as a farmer to check your eligibility right now, or explore the source code to understand how it works — everything is open.
lp_cta_student: A student project for agricultural equity
lp_footer_desc: Helping Indian farmers discover the welfare schemes they're entitled to — through voice, AI, and open data.

pc_alt_desc: Try modifying your profile parameters if you believe there was an error, or run a Simultaneous Check against all available schemes from the dropdown above.

sh_upload_desc: Upload scheme PDFs to build the knowledge base

hs_no_checks_desc: Run your first eligibility check from the Check page

db_check_desc: Analyze farmer profile against government scheme documents using AI
db_no_schemes: No schemes uploaded yet. Upload PDFs to get started.

vi_desc_example: Tell us about your farm, income and existing schemes. Our AI will automatically extract your profile — "I am Ramesh from Maharashtra..."

chat_dash_subtitle: Dedicated AI workspace for farming intelligence and app support
chat_dash_placeholder: Ask Krishi Mitra about schemes, weather, or agriculture...
chat_dash_welcome: Welcome to Krishi Mitra Support. I am your specialized AI agricultural assistant. You can ask me about farming techniques, government schemes, or how to use this app.
faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about the product and how it empowers Indian agriculture.
faq_a1: Niti Setu is an advanced agricultural intelligence platform designed to bridge the gap between farmers and government schemes. It uses AI, RAG search, and voice interactions to instantly check eligibility without manual document reading.
faq_q2: Is it free for farmers to use?
faq_a2: Yes! Core eligibility checks, Krishi Mitra voice assistance, and scheme browsing are entirely free for public users.
faq_a3: You can upload an image of your Aadhaar or Land Record. Our Vision AI extracting text (like name, state, land size) and fills the eligibility form. Once done, the image is instantly deleted.
faq_a4: 100% safe. We utilize an ephemeral architecture. The moment our AI reads the text, the image file is permanently wiped from the server disk. We do not store your physical documents.
faq_a5: Yes, Krishi Mitra supports multiple Indian languages. You can speak naturally in your mother tongue using the microphone.
faq_a6: Krishi Mitra uses RAG to read directly from official PDF documents uploaded on the backend before answering.
lp_subtitle: Establishing trust through transparency and state-of-the-art protection protocols.
lp_audit: Our systems are audited and compliant with modern data protection standards. Use Niti Setu with confidence.
lp_sec1_desc: Niti Setu is built with the Digital Personal Data Protection (DPDP) Act of India in mind. We minimize data collection to only what is strictly necessary to accurately compute your scheme eligibility.
lp_sec2_desc: When you upload Aadhaar cards or 7/12 records, they are processed in a secure container. Immediately after extraction, the image is destroyed permanently from our servers. We NEVER store your document images.
lp_sec3_desc: All data transmitted is secured using bank-grade TLS/SSL encryption. Database records are secured within our isolated clusters with strictly controlled access.
lp_sec4_desc: We actively strip Personally Identifiable Information (PII) from data before sending it to AI models, ensuring your identity remains completely anonymous during AI computation.
